name: Adebola S.
quote: The CBT practice portal was a game-changer. I felt so confident on exam day and scored 312. Thank you, Movid Academy!

name: Priya K.
quote: My tutor was incredible. They helped me break down the Data Insights section, which was my weakest point. I got into my dream MBA program!

name: Michael C.
quote: I needed a Band 8 in Writing, and I got it! The detailed feedback on my essays made all the difference. Highly recommend the Writing Focus plan.

name: Emily R.
quote: The group classes were engaging, and I learned so many strategies I hadn't seen anywhere else. My score improved by 210 points!
